name: react-native-vision-camera
description: A powerful, high-performance React Native Camera library. FOSS version without Google ML Kit.

scripts.postinstall: cd package && (test -d lib || (bun install && bun run build)) || true

author: Marc Rousavy <me@mrousavy.com> (https://github.com/mrousavy), FOSS fork by LuckyTheCookie
